snippet: A federal jury awarded $1 billion in damages to the crop biotechnology giant Monsanto, saying that its arch rival DuPont had willfully infringed a patent.
abstract: Federal jury awards $1 billion in damages to crop biotechnology firm Monsanto, saying that its rival DuPont had willfully infringed a patent covering Roundup Ready soybeans.
lead_paragraph: A federal jury awarded $1 billion in damages to the crop biotechnology giant Monsanto, saying that its arch rival DuPont had willfully infringed a patent.

headline.main: Monsanto Wins Big Award in a Biotech Patent Case
headline.print_headline: Monsanto Wins $1 Billion In a Biotech Patent Case
